coins.notes: Earliest 1oz bar (late 1960s). Faint 'X8' over-stamp errors observed. Sample Serials: 10023, 10030, 10031, 10038, 10062, 10063, 10088. Estimated Mintage: <100
coins.obverse_description: [1.000] [999+] [Hallmark in Elongated Octagon] [Serial Number]

coins.notes: 1968-early 1970s. Lacks Canadian 'Bull' Hallmark. Font change around 75000 serial. Sample Serials: 05972, 13762, 38915, 41395, 43090, 44176, 44645, 45734, 60942, 72492, 76891. Estimated Mintage: <17,500
coins.obverse_description: [‘ENGELHARD INDUSTRIES OF CANADA LTD.’ in Elongated Octagon] [REFINERS & ASSAYERS] [1oz. troy SILVER 999 fine] [Serial Number]

coins.notes: Similar to above, but with a larger serial font. Sample Serials: 81787, 81790, 81791, 82109, 83489. Estimated Mintage: <1,000
coins.obverse_description: [‘ENGELHARD INDUSTRIES OF CANADA LTD.’ in Elongated Octagon] [REFINERS & ASSAYERS] [1oz. troy SILVER 999 fine] [Serial Number]

coins.notes: 6-digit variety, lacks the Canadian 'Bull' Hallmark. Sample Serials: 162581, 163588. Estimated Mintage: 1,000
coins.obverse_description: [ENGELHARD INDUSTRIES OF CANADA LTD.] [REFINERS & ASSAYERS] [1 oz. troy SILVER 999 fine] [Serial Number]
